title: What are the best books on the history of political thought? - Quora

response.answer_text: George H. Sabine, A History of Political Theory (1951/1973).C. Northcote Parkinson, The Evolution of Political Thought (1958).William Montgomery McGovern, From Luther to Hitler (1941).Howard P. Segal, Utopias (2012).
